meanings.sent1: The baseball player was outhitting all his teammates during practice.
meanings.sent2: She was outhitting her opponent in the tennis match.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel was outhitting all the other animals in finding acorns.
meanings.sent4: The student was outhitting the teacher in solving math problems.
meanings.sent5: The chef was outhitting everyone else in the kitchen with her knife skills.

meanings.definition: To strike more successfully than someone else.
meanings.sent1: The skilled boxer was outhitting his opponent with precise punches.
meanings.sent2: The carpenter was outhitting his coworker in hammering nails.
meanings.sent3: The comedian was outhitting all the other performers with his jokes.
meanings.sent4: The artist was outhitting her peers with her unique painting style.
meanings.sent5: The singer was outhitting the other contestants with her powerful voice.
